data.title: Brøndby IF live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: Brøndby IF live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
Brøndby IF live scores, players, season schedule and today’s results are available on Sofascore.

Brøndby IF next match

Brøndby IF will play the next match against AGF on Aug 11, 2024, 2:00:00 PM UTC in Danish Superliga.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Brøndby IF vs AGF live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some Brøndby IF matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

Brøndby IF previous match

Brøndby IF previous match was against Legia Warszawa in UEFA Conference League, the match ended with result 2 - 3 (Legia Warszawa won the match).

Brøndby IF fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all Brøndby IF scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Brøndby IF performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Brøndby IF matches.

Current Brøndby IF players

Forward: Ohi Omoijuanfo, Yuito Suzuki, Emmanuel Yeboah, Mathias Kvistgaarden, Oscar Schwartau, Filip Bundgaard, Nicolai Vallys Midfielder: Daniel Wass, Marko Divković, Sean Klaiber, Josip Radošević, Noah Nartey, Christian Cappis, Sebastian Sebulonsen, Kevin Mensah, Mathias Greve, Bertram Kvist Defender: Justin Che, Rasmus Lauritsen, Jacob Rasmussen, Henrik Heggheim, Frederik Alves, Jordi Vanlerberghe, Clement Bischoff, Kevin Tshiembe, Ludwig Vraa-Jensen Goalkeeper: Patrick Pentz, Thomas Mikkelsen, William Sonne-Schmidt

The current Brøndby IF roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

Brøndby IF top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
